app.pro_required: Please upgrade to Pro to use this feature
app.choose_folder: Choose a folder to save the file

net.address_sync_from_server: Get the latest address from the server
net.address_sync_reset: Reset the address to the default value

settings.web_server_subtitle: Let devices in the local network view the downloaded comics through the browser
settings.migrate_subtitle: Change your data folder to the memory card
settings.migrate_confirm: This feature will be saved after restarting the program, are you sure
settings.will_pop_notice: Press the back key twice in a row to exit the app
settings.android_secure_flag: Disable screenshot/disable display in task view
settings.authentication: Authentication when entering the app (if the system has already entered the password or fingerprint)

chooser_root.title: Chooser root
chooser_root.hint: Enter the folder selector root path
chooser_root.desc: The default path for selecting the directory when exporting, also the root path, you can try to set this option if the export is not normal

copy_full_name_template.title: Copy full name template
copy_full_name_template.hint: Enter the copy full name template

download_and_export_path.title: Download and export path
download_and_export_path.desc: You will select a directory, if the file system is writable, the download will be automatically exported

download_cache_path.title: Download cache path
download_cache_path.desc: You will select a directory, this directory is copied from the following directory to use. The download will be read as a cache folder first.
download_cache_path.cancel_desc: Are you sure you want to cancel the function of downloading content acceleration with other software? You can set it again after canceling

import_view_log_from_off.title: Import other program's history record
import_view_log_from_off.desc: You will select a file, this file is copied from the following path to use.

export_path.ios_desc: You can find the exported content in the file manager
export_path.ios_desc2:
You are using an iOS device:
Please open the system's built-in file manager to browse the exported content
export_path.android_desc:
You are using an Android device:
If the export fails and prompts insufficient permissions, you can try to create a subdirectory under Download or Document for export

full_screen_action.title: Control method
full_screen_action.touch_double_once_next: Double click to fullscreen + click once to next page
full_screen_action.three_area: Divide the screen into three areas (previous page, next page, fullscreen)

hidden_words.title: Hide by keyword
hidden_words.clear_all_desc: Are you sure you want to clear all keywords?

import_notice.android_desc:
You are using an Android device:
If you cannot import and export and prompt insufficient permissions, you can try to create a subdirectory under Download or Document for import

local_history_sync.auto_sync_desc: After opening the application, the history will be automatically backed up

no_animation.title: Cancel page animation (tap screen, volume key, keyboard)

reader_two_page_direction.title: Two page reader content arrangement
reader_two_page_direction.choose: Choose two page reader content arrangement

reader_type.title: Reader mode
reader_type.web_toon_free_zoom:
WebToon (ListView double click to zoom)
(This mode progress bar is invalid)

startup_pic.title: Set startup picture
startup_pic.subtitle: Set the picture displayed when the application starts
startup_pic.clear_subtitle: Clear the picture displayed when the application starts
